title: Publisher Rocket Tutorial: Discover Your Book Competitors and Boost Sales

tactics.name: Competitor Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify and analyze competing books on Amazon
steps: Input ISBN or book title into Publisher Rocket
Compare categories, keywords, pricing, and sales metrics
Evaluate competitor BSR and review counts
caveats: Tool may not account for non-Amazon sales channels
source_quotes: I use Publisher Rocket to compare any book on Amazon

heuristics.name: Review Count Boost
heuristics.condition: If a book has low review counts, prioritize boosting visibility
source_quotes: Books with 68 pages and $15 price make less than mine

claims.statement: Authors should diversify sales beyond a single platform
source_quotes: One platform should not be your only source of income

niche_patterns.example: Christian children + learning disabilities + affordable pricing
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique needs
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (Christian), problem (learning), and constraint (affordable pricing)
source_quotes: She discounted at 40% and now 45% for her coloring book
